desc.en: [USERNAME] Sensei goes to Izuna's house to watch her favorite ninja period drama together. Afterwards, Sensei quips that it's obvious why Izuna likes these period dramas so much, a fact that makes her very happy.

desc.zh_cn: 为了和{cf伊树菜}一起看她喜欢的忍者时代剧，[USERNAME]老师前往{cf伊树菜}的家。一起看完时代剧之后，老师说好像知道{cf伊树菜}为什么这么喜欢时代剧了。{cf伊树菜}听到老师这么说，感到开心至极。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is fighting on multiple fronts when Hifumi arrives with reinforcements from Trinity in tow. Using the unexpected arrival as a distraction, the Foreclosure Task Force breaks through the enemy lines.
desc.zh_cn: {cf日步美}与{sn三一}学园的支持，来到面对多数敌人的{cn对策委员会}一行人面前。{cn对策委员会}趁敌人陷入混乱，快速突破敌阵。

desc.en: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.jp: When the Foreclosure Task Force arrives at Abydos High's old main building, a Kaiser board member bars their way. However, Aru and Problem Solver 68 arrive in the nick of time.
desc.zh_cn: 抵达{sn阿拜多斯}高中旧本馆的{cn对策委员会}一行人。尽管凯萨PMC的干部挡住他们的面前，不过晚来的{cf亚瑠}和{cn便利屋68}一行人即时出现帮助{cn对策委员会}。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is in front of the building's gate but found enemies are under fire. Hifumi, at this point, connects onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stresses these howitzer have nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force begins to break through the lines.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is in front of the building's gate but found enemies are under fire. Hifumi, at this point, connects onto the comm and explained the situation to everyone; and in particular she stresses these howitzer have nothing to do with Trinity. After the comm, the Foreclosure Task Force begins to break through the lines.
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}众人来到建筑门口，遭到敌人阻拦。{cf日步美}此时接入通讯，向各位表示了情况，并着重提到这些榴弹炮与{sn三一}毫无关联。通讯结束后，{cn对策委员会}几人开始突破。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.en: Everyone comes to the middle of the desert and recognizes the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduces the situation here and mentions about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director says they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 come out and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrust the combat to Problem Solver 68 and then look for Hoshino themselves.
desc.jp: Everyone comes to the middle of the desert and recognizes the traces of the former Abydos High School. The director introduces the situation here and mentions about the "Laboratory" that the Black Suit once mentioned. Yet the director says they must pass him first, and at this moment all of the Problem Solver 68 come out and aid. The Foreclosure Task Force entrust the combat to Problem Solver 68 and then look for Hoshino themselves.
desc.zh_cn: 众人来到了沙漠中央，认出了曾经{sn阿拜多斯}学校的踪迹。理事向各位简单介绍了这里的情况，并提到了黑服所称的“实验室”，就在另一边的建筑里。但理事表示必须先过了他这一关，就在这时{cn便利屋68}全员赶到，开始支援。{cn对策委员会}将应战责任委托给便利屋众人，自己则前往寻找{cf星野}。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: While Aris and Veritas create a distraction, Midori, Momoi, and Sensei attempt a frontal assault on Seminar.
desc.jp: While Aris and Veritas create a distraction, Midori, Momoi, and Sensei attempt a frontal assault on Seminar.
desc.zh_cn: 在{cf爱丽丝}和{cn贝里塔斯}成员进行佯攻作战的时候，{cf绿}、{cf桃井}和老师一起尝试正面突破{cn研讨会}。

desc.en: Veritas' hacking ends up trapping Akane in a sealed room.
desc.jp: Veritas' hacking ends up trapping Akane in a sealed room.
desc.zh_cn: 由于{cn贝里塔斯}暗中进行骇入行动，{cf朱音}被困在密室里。

desc.en: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.
desc.jp: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}充当强行突破的角色，然而不幸被捕。{cf朱音}表示了对{cf爱丽丝}的喜欢。{cf优香}突然意识到其中的陷阱，嘱咐下属更换安保系统时避开由{cn工程师部}研发的。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system with EMP for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to hack in.
desc.jp: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system with EMP for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to hack in.
desc.zh_cn: 两小时前的作战会议中，{cf晴}提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，{cf响}提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时{cn贝里塔斯}即可开始骇入。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Akane thought herself would be meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.
desc.jp: Akane thought herself would be meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.

desc.en: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka was too late to realize the trap set by Aris. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they still met other Seminar members.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka was too late to realize the trap set by Aris. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they still met other Seminar members.
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃井}和{cf绿}到达了电梯前，与此同时{cf朱音}等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时{cf优香}才意识到{cf爱丽丝}的问题，而{cf桃井}、{cf绿}与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。

desc.en: Though the door stayed closed and unable to contact Asuna, Akane received a message from another partner - Karin. She confirmed that the Game Development Department members had already within the shooting range.
desc.jp: Though the door stayed closed and unable to contact Asuna, Akane received a message from another partner - Karin. She confirmed that the Game Development Department members had already within the shooting range.
desc.zh_cn: 闸门虽无法打开，也联系不上{cf明日奈}，但这时{cf朱音}收到了另一位同伴的消息——{cf花凛}确认，{cn游戏开发部}成员已进入射击范围。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}一行人在{cf咏叶}部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手{cf花凛}，但另一名女仆部成员{cf明日奈}却出现在一行人面前。

desc.en: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.jp: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.zh_cn: 就在{cf桃井}一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，{cf绿}立刻意识到是狙击手{cf花凛}所为。在楼顶上，就在{cf花凛}准备继续下一发时，{cn工程师部}及时阻止并扰乱了计划。{cf桃井}等人立刻继续前进。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，{cn游戏开发部}社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。

desc.en: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.jp: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.zh_cn: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长{cf宁瑠}。{cf宁瑠}说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对{cf爱丽丝}提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。

desc.en: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flooding in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by a few bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.jp: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flooding in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by a few bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.zh_cn: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，{cf桃井}提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。

desc.en: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.jp: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十一首曲子，常在“招聘”（抽卡）页面播放。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a fight. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer get pursued. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light.
desc.jp: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a fight. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer get pursued. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light.
desc.zh_cn: {cf宁瑠}前来挑战开发部众人。{cf宁瑠}先是称赞了{cf柚子}的勇气，然后向{cf爱丽丝}发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。{cf宁瑠}还没反应过来，{cf爱丽丝}就抢先发射了光之剑。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}和老师正在苦思要加入游戏新作的创意。{cf桃井}和{cf绿}的意见发生分歧，两人为了做出最后的结论，于是决定使用{cn游戏开发部}代代相传的方式决胜负。另一方面，{cf柚子}为了让{cf爱丽丝}能获得特别的灵感，于是给了她任务。苦思该如何运行任务的{cf爱丽丝}决定先和老师一起去学园冒险。

desc.en: The Game Development Department started discussing about the game. From the mechanics of the dungeon, to the weapon and arsenal, as well as the art and manifestations. Midori was in great dissatisfaction due to how much emphasis did Momoi put on art. And with the fact that she often changed ideas, many art resources were discarded too. The twins forced Sensei to make a decision.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department started discussing about the game. From the mechanics of the dungeon, to the weapon and arsenal, as well as the art and manifestations. Midori was in great dissatisfaction due to how much emphasis did Momoi put on art. And with the fact that she often changed ideas, many art resources were discarded too. The twins forced Sensei to make a decision.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}众人开始讨论游戏的具体形式。从地牢的机制到武器装备，以及美术和表现形式之类。因为{cf桃井}过于强调美术而又常常易稿，许多美术资源都被废弃，引来妹妹{cf绿}的非常不满。两人强迫老师做出一个选择。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Yuzu stopped the twins and said that it should be decided by "that" - playing a game - a tradition in the club. While the two were playing games, Yuzu assigned Aris the task of going outside for a walk, in the hope of some inspirations.
desc.jp: Yuzu stopped the twins and said that it should be decided by "that" - playing a game - a tradition in the club. While the two were playing games, Yuzu assigned Aris the task of going outside for a walk, in the hope of some inspirations.
desc.zh_cn: {cf柚子}及时拦下了两人，表示要用社团的“那个”——进行游戏对局——来决定。就在两人打游戏的时候，{cf柚子}分配给了{cf爱丽丝}去外边转几圈的任务，希望能够由此获得一些灵感。

desc.en: Aris and Sensei came to the campus. Aris said that both she and Sensei were "Beginner Heros", due to a small argument in which Momoi tries to put BOSSes right at the beginning of the game and was rejected. Aris wondered how to complete Yuzu's missions, and Sensei advised Aris to just go forward to see if anything happens.
desc.jp: Aris and Sensei came to the campus. Aris said that both she and Sensei were "Beginner Heros", due to a small argument in which Momoi tries to put BOSSes right at the beginning of the game and was rejected. Aris wondered how to complete Yuzu's missions, and Sensei advised Aris to just go forward to see if anything happens.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}与老师来到了{sn千年}校园。{cf爱丽丝}说自己和老师都是“见习勇者”，而这源于{cf桃井}试图在新手村外放BOSS而被否决一事。{cf爱丽丝}对如何进行{cf柚子}的任务很苦恼，而老师则建议{cf爱丽丝}先前进再说。

desc.en: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.jp: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.zh_cn: {cf季}原以为{cf宁瑠}会独自去拯救{cf爱丽丝}，包含{cf宁瑠}在内的所有{cnC&C}成员都开始和{cf季}交战。{cn游戏开发部}一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往{et埃里都}的中心。

desc.en: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.jp: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.zh_cn: {cf季}表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和{cnC&C}这边的行动，奉劝{cnC&C}不要再做无谓抵抗。但{cnC&C}佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，{cf季}傲慢地向{cnC&C}解析了他们的行动计划，认为{cf宁瑠}会随老师一起；但这并非事实。

desc.en: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_cn: {cnC&C}强大的夹攻成功让{cf季}处于劣势。{cf季}变更了{et埃里都}的结构，借此孤立了{cf宁瑠}。另一方面，原本都很顺利的{cn游戏开发部}遇见了{cf莉音}的强大兵器前卫君。

desc.en: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_cn: 在{cnC&C}和{cf季}对峙的时候，{cf莉音}早已察觉到老师和{cn游戏开发部}前来拯救{cf爱丽丝}，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止{cn游戏开发部}一行人。

desc.en: C&C and Toki were on a par with each other. Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she isolated the other members and made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.jp: C&C and Toki were on a par with each other. Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she isolated the other members and made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.zh_cn: {cnC&C}与{cf季}打的有来有回。{cf季}领悟到了{cnC&C}这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将{cf宁瑠}与{sn其他}成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The communication with Veritas was cut off all at once, and everyone was greeted by Rio. Rio wasn't surprised by the current situation, and mentioned the "Trolley Problem" with Sensei - which repeated her theory of "sacrificing little in exchange of the lives of the most". Momoi cut it off and made her position clear and loud. Seeing no turning back, Rio put Avant Guard into use.
desc.jp: The communication with Veritas was cut off all at once, and everyone was greeted by Rio. Rio wasn't surprised by the current situation, and mentioned the "Trolley Problem" with Sensei - which repeated her theory of "sacrificing little in exchange of the lives of the most". Momoi cut it off and made her position clear and loud. Seeing no turning back, Rio put Avant Guard into use.
desc.zh_cn: 与{cn贝里塔斯}的通讯突然中断，取而代之的是{cf莉音}的问候。{cf莉音}对形势并不感到惊讶，并向老师提出了“电车难题”——同样是在重复一开始“以少数者的伤亡换大多数的生存”的理论。{cf桃井}打断了对话，阐明自己只想把{cf爱丽丝}带回来。{cf莉音}见对话再无挽回，启用了前卫君。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.jp: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.zh_cn: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在{cf朱音}的建议下，老师和{cf宁瑠}找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但{cf季}似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让{cf宁瑠}受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。

desc.en: C&C was unable to inflict any damage to the suit, as Chihiro reported. Chihiro also noticed that it seemed that all the electricity and computing power were all on this suit, making it even be able to predict the future. On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane suddenly pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.
desc.jp: C&C was unable to inflict any damage to the suit, as Chihiro reported. Chihiro also noticed that it seemed that all the electricity and computing power were all on this suit, making it even be able to predict the future. On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane suddenly pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.
desc.zh_cn: {cnC&C}没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，{cf千寻}报告了这点。同时{cf千寻}还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定{cf未来}。听闻此话的{cn游戏开发部}众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时{cf朱音}突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Sensei realized something all of a sudden, commanding Neru to get to the rooftop. Rio said it was useless to do so, but Sensei didn't respond. Toki fired at Neru and blew up the rooftop, as the two falling down from the top.
desc.jp: Sensei realized something all of a sudden, commanding Neru to get to the rooftop. Rio said it was useless to do so, but Sensei didn't respond. Toki fired at Neru and blew up the rooftop, as the two falling down from the top.
desc.zh_cn: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令{cf宁瑠}将战场转移到房顶上。{cf莉音}表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。{cf季}向{cf宁瑠}开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

name.en: How About Falling Down The Sky
name.jp: How About Falling Down The Sky

desc.en: Sensei finally revealed the true intent: if it was designed to battle on the ground, then how about falling from the sky? The fact proved it right. Though only in a flash, Yuzu had already spotted its weakness.
desc.jp: Sensei finally revealed the true intent: if it was designed to battle on the ground, then how about falling from the sky? The fact proved it right. Though only in a flash, Yuzu had already spotted its weakness.
desc.zh_cn: 老师的意图此时终于表现出来：既然是为地面作战设计，在空中又怎么样呢？事实证明的确如此。虽然只有一瞬间的时间，但{cf柚子}已经完全注意到了其弱点所在。

desc.en: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.jp: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.zh_cn: {cf宁瑠}最终还是没能胜利。{cf莉音}指示时回收老师，但此时机体却出现了一丝破绽，{cf千寻}让{cf桃井}抓住机会对其攻击，成功让众人先行撤退。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: 優香對這兩人居然因為分組而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在兩人不肯讓步的情況下，優香勒令兩人用猜拳的方式決定，否則計劃就要趕不上了。無奈，兩人只好以此決勝。
desc.jp: 優香對這兩人居然因為分組而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在兩人不肯讓步的情況下，優香勒令兩人用猜拳的方式決定，否則計劃就要趕不上了。無奈，兩人只好以此決勝。
desc.zh_cn: {cf优香}对这两人居然因为分组而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在两人不肯让步的情况下，{cf优香}勒令两人用猜拳的方式决定，否则计划就要赶不上了。无奈，两人只好以此决胜。

She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.jp: 琳回憶起總裁曾對她說的話，他說只要有了所謂“遠古兵器”就能佔有整個基沃託斯――這確實是很奇怪的一件事。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}回忆起总裁曾对她说的话，他说只要有了所谓“远古兵器”就能占有整个基沃托斯――这确实是很奇怪的一件事。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

name.jp: カイザーPMCプレジデント

desc.en: 星野接入通訊，此刻對策委員會的其他人已經到了阿拜多斯沙漠。眾人終於理解為何凱撒要蠶食阿拜多斯的土地，也明白了所謂“尋寶”是什麼東西。星野認為，在這種情況下，只要把武器搶過來就好；綾音提醒星野那裡是凱撒的私有土地，不過星野表示“為何不效仿一下白子”，隨即全員戴上了面罩。
desc.jp: 星野接入通訊，此刻對策委員會的其他人已經到了阿拜多斯沙漠。眾人終於理解為何凱撒要蠶食阿拜多斯的土地，也明白了所謂“尋寶”是什麼東西。星野認為，在這種情況下，只要把武器搶過來就好；綾音提醒星野那裡是凱撒的私有土地，不過星野表示“為何不效仿一下白子”，隨即全員戴上了面罩。
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}接入通讯，此刻{cn对策委员会}的{sn其他}人已经到了{sn阿拜多斯}沙漠。众人终于理解为何凯撒要蚕食{sn阿拜多斯}的土地，也明白了所谓“寻宝”是什么东西。{cf星野}认为，在这种情况下，只要把武器抢过来就好；{cf绫音}提醒{cf星野}那里是凯撒的私有土地，不过{cf星野}表示“为何不效仿一下{cf白子}”，随即全员戴上了面罩。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: 綾音有些猝不及防，不過還是順著他們戴上了面罩。她提到說凱撒似乎已經撤離了那個基地，聽到這話的星野有點失落，摘下了面罩。陽葵表示要將武器帶回來可能有些困難，因而他們隨後也會到場；星野疑惑武器的大小，而陽葵說，根據老師的說法，那是一艘宇宙戰艦。眾人吃了一驚。
desc.jp: 綾音有些猝不及防，不過還是順著他們戴上了面罩。她提到說凱撒似乎已經撤離了那個基地，聽到這話的星野有點失落，摘下了面罩。陽葵表示要將武器帶回來可能有些困難，因而他們隨後也會到場；星野疑惑武器的大小，而陽葵說，根據老師的說法，那是一艘宇宙戰艦。眾人吃了一驚。
desc.zh_cn: {cf绫音}有些猝不及防，不过还是顺着他们戴上了面罩。她提到说凯撒似乎已经撤离了那个基地，听到这话的{cf星野}有点失落，摘下了面罩。{cf阳葵}表示要将武器带回来可能有些困难，因而他们随后也会到场；{cf星野}疑惑武器的大小，而{cf阳葵}说，根据老师的说法，那是一艘宇宙战舰。众人吃了一惊。

desc.en: 在獲得Kei的力量後進行了重建，「阿特拉哈西斯：Supernova」粉碎了方舟的多次元屏障。生命守護者就這樣全速向前進，成功進入了方舟的內部。
desc.jp: 在獲得Kei的力量後進行了重建，「阿特拉哈西斯：Supernova」粉碎了方舟的多次元屏障。生命守護者就這樣全速向前進，成功進入了方舟的內部。
desc.zh_cn: 在获得Kei的力量后进行了重建，「阿特拉哈西斯：Supernova」粉碎了方舟的多次元屏障。生命守护者就这样全速向前进，成功进入了方舟的内部。

desc.en: 莉音進一步解釋，愛麗絲的方舟與防護罩是同一種東西，因而這並非某種“複製”，應該能夠對其造成干涉。陽葵指出方舟的形態依建造者決定，顯然莉音的是一個堡壘都市，不過愛麗絲的嘛……
desc.jp: 莉音進一步解釋，愛麗絲的方舟與防護罩是同一種東西，因而這並非某種“複製”，應該能夠對其造成干涉。陽葵指出方舟的形態依建造者決定，顯然莉音的是一個堡壘都市，不過愛麗絲的嘛……
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}进一步解释，{cf爱丽丝}的方舟与防护罩是同一种东西，因而这并非某种“复制”，应该能够对其造成干涉。{cf阳葵}指出方舟的形态依建造者决定，显然{cf莉音}的是一个堡垒都市，不过{cf爱丽丝}的嘛……

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 地上，工程師部三人發現艦艇的資料正在被分解而重新組合，最終變成了工程師部所鑄造的光之劍的模樣。
desc.jp: 地上，工程師部三人發現艦艇的資料正在被分解而重新組合，最終變成了工程師部所鑄造的光之劍的模樣。
desc.zh_cn: 地上，{cn工程师部}三人发现舰艇的数据正在被分解而重新组合，最终变成了{cn工程师部}所铸造的光之剑的模样。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}指出这不仅才是真正意义上的方舟，同时更是{cf爱丽丝}内心勇气的体现。{cf阳葵}给它取了个名字，叫“光之剑：阿特拉哈西斯的方舟”。

desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 在一聲“光――――啊――――！”的喊聲中，光之劍重重地打出了一炮。
desc.jp: 在一聲“光――――啊――――！”的喊聲中，光之劍重重地打出了一炮。
desc.zh_cn: 在一声“光――――啊――――！”的喊声中，光之剑重重地打出了一炮。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.jp: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: 優香、佳世子與亞子報告愛麗絲的光之劍發射出極高的能量，並正直直向方舟飛去，瞄準誤差可忽略不計。
desc.jp: 優香、佳世子與亞子報告愛麗絲的光之劍發射出極高的能量，並正直直向方舟飛去，瞄準誤差可忽略不計。
desc.zh_cn: {cf优香}、{cf佳世子}与{cf亚子}报告{cf爱丽丝}的光之剑发射出极高的能量，并正直直向方舟飞去，瞄准误差可忽略不计。

desc.en: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.jp: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第101首曲子，在最终篇第三章占领方舟的活动战斗任务里使用。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 命中的一炮產生了反向衝擊波。衝擊波後，艦長七神琳下令方舟以最大速度前進，試圖突破防護罩。碰撞後，綾音立刻減速。隨後與方舟本體發生碰撞，眾人成功突入進方舟內部。
desc.jp: 命中的一炮產生了反向衝擊波。衝擊波後，艦長七神琳下令方舟以最大速度前進，試圖突破防護罩。碰撞後，綾音立刻減速。隨後與方舟本體發生碰撞，眾人成功突入進方舟內部。
desc.zh_cn: 命中的一炮产生了反向冲击波。冲击波后，舰长七神{cf琳}下令方舟以最大速度前进，试图突破防护罩。碰撞后，{cf绫音}立刻减速。随后与方舟本体发生碰撞，众人成功突入进方舟内部。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 聽到此種讚賞，莉音突然情緒崩潰，離開了通訊，自己在某處辦公室的桌子下抱著頭。
desc.jp: 聽到此種讚賞，莉音突然情緒崩潰，離開了通訊，自己在某處辦公室的桌子下抱著頭。
desc.zh_cn: 听到此种赞赏，{cf莉音}突然情绪崩溃，离开了通讯，自己在某处办公室的桌子下抱着头。

desc.en: Kei與愛麗絲回到了最一開始她們被找到的那個廢墟里。愛麗絲向Kei告別，隨後倒地失去意識――但被Kei及時摟住。Kei這時完全理解了愛麗絲的“勇者”與“勇氣”究竟為何物，並以自己，一個武器，的消失作為代價，救回了愛麗絲；自己卻變成了一個小機器人。
desc.jp: Kei與愛麗絲回到了最一開始她們被找到的那個廢墟里。愛麗絲向Kei告別，隨後倒地失去意識――但被Kei及時摟住。Kei這時完全理解了愛麗絲的“勇者”與“勇氣”究竟為何物，並以自己，一個武器，的消失作為代價，救回了愛麗絲；自己卻變成了一個小機器人。
desc.zh_cn: Kei与{cf爱丽丝}回到了最一开始她们被找到的那个废墟里。{cf爱丽丝}向Kei告别，随后倒地失去意识――但被Kei及时搂住。Kei这时完全理解了{cf爱丽丝}的“勇者”与“勇气”究竟为何物，并以自己，一个武器，的消失作为代价，救回了{cf爱丽丝}；自己却变成了一个小机器人。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: 莉音和陽葵成功奪回生命守護者主艦的操控權，但季已經到極限了。救世主在危機的一刻出現了。
desc.jp: 莉音和陽葵成功奪回生命守護者主艦的操控權，但季已經到極限了。救世主在危機的一刻出現了。
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}和{cf阳葵}成功夺回生命守护者主舰的操控权，但{cf季}已经到极限了。救世主在危机的一刻出现了。

desc.en: 由於連線已經從物理上斷開，短時間內方舟將無法再駭入生命守護者。陽葵表示將重新設定安全系統，取回控制權，並要莉音要求季進行撤退。
desc.jp: 由於連線已經從物理上斷開，短時間內方舟將無法再駭入生命守護者。陽葵表示將重新設定安全系統，取回控制權，並要莉音要求季進行撤退。
desc.zh_cn: 由于连接已经从物理上断开，短时间内方舟将无法再骇入生命守护者。{cf阳葵}表示将重新设置安全系统，取回控制权，并要{cf莉音}要求{cf季}进行撤退。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 季向莉音大人抱歉，並表示自己能與她共事是她極大的榮幸。季說她想和夏萊、和C&C的前輩們一起戰鬥——而她對此非常感激。她向莉音詢問Abi-Eshuh的自爆密碼，認為其能爆炸的能量應能徹底摧毀聖所——她覺得，以莉音的性格，應當會有此種保險措施以防她叛變，但莉音表示那不存在。
desc.jp: 季向莉音大人抱歉，並表示自己能與她共事是她極大的榮幸。季說她想和夏萊、和C&C的前輩們一起戰鬥——而她對此非常感激。她向莉音詢問Abi-Eshuh的自爆密碼，認為其能爆炸的能量應能徹底摧毀聖所——她覺得，以莉音的性格，應當會有此種保險措施以防她叛變，但莉音表示那不存在。
desc.zh_cn: {cf季}向{cf莉音}大人抱歉，并表示自己能与她共事是她极大的荣幸。{cf季}说她想和{et夏莱}、和{cnC&C}的前辈们一起战斗——而她对此非常感激。她向{cf莉音}询问Abi-Eshuh的自爆密码，认为其能爆炸的能量应能彻底摧毁圣所——她觉得，以{cf莉音}的性格，应当会有此种保险措施以防她叛变，但{cf莉音}表示那不存在。

desc.en: 季提到了莉音曾說過的“電車難題”，指出“需要有人去拉下操縱桿”——但莉音打斷了她，指出那是她自己的錯，沒有去找人幫忙。季相信莉音，但不抱希望。
desc.jp: 季提到了莉音曾說過的“電車難題”，指出“需要有人去拉下操縱桿”——但莉音打斷了她，指出那是她自己的錯，沒有去找人幫忙。季相信莉音，但不抱希望。
desc.zh_cn: {cf季}提到了{cf莉音}曾说过的“电车难题”，指出“需要有人去拉下操纵杆”——但{cf莉音}打断了她，指出那是她自己的错，没有去找人帮忙。{cf季}相信{cf莉音}，但不抱希望。

desc.en: 莉音詢問眾人如何趕到，而乃愛則表示C&C在情況變成這樣之前早已出動。莉音對此感到驚訝，詢問她究竟如何得知，而此時聖亞接入通訊，她表示她將直覺和預感告訴了乃愛。乃愛最後將季託付給C&C後離開。解釋完事情後，C&C眾人開始應戰。
desc.jp: 莉音詢問眾人如何趕到，而乃愛則表示C&C在情況變成這樣之前早已出動。莉音對此感到驚訝，詢問她究竟如何得知，而此時聖亞接入通訊，她表示她將直覺和預感告訴了乃愛。乃愛最後將季託付給C&C後離開。解釋完事情後，C&C眾人開始應戰。
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}询问众人如何赶到，而{cf乃爱}则表示{cnC&C}在情况变成这样之前早已出动。{cf莉音}对此感到惊讶，询问她究竟如何得知，而此时{cf圣亚}接入通讯，她表示她将直觉和预感告诉了{cf乃爱}。{cf乃爱}最后将{cf季}托付给{cnC&C}后离开。解释完事情后，{cnC&C}众人开始应战。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

desc.en: 莉音有些鬱鬱不樂。優香請莉音振作一些，而陽葵則插了一嘴，說莉音可就是這樣在“乾淨”和“渾濁”的兩條河裡頭淌水的人。
desc.jp: 莉音有些鬱鬱不樂。優香請莉音振作一些，而陽葵則插了一嘴，說莉音可就是這樣在“乾淨”和“渾濁”的兩條河裡頭淌水的人。
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}有些郁郁不乐。{cf优香}请{cf莉音}振作一些，而{cf阳葵}则插了一嘴，说{cf莉音}可就是这样在“干净”和“浑浊”的两条河里头淌水的人。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.jp: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.zh_cn:
为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.jp: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?

为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

desc.en: Shizuko and the others succeed in discovering the hot springs first thanks to Chise's efforts, and the Hot Springs Department members clearly admit defeat. However, Shizuko opts to sign a franchise contract with the Hot Springs Department and promises to maintain a cooperative relationship.
desc.jp: Shizuko and the others succeed in discovering the hot springs first thanks to Chise's efforts, and the Hot Springs Department members clearly admit defeat. However, Shizuko opts to sign a franchise contract with the Hot Springs Department and promises to maintain a cooperative relationship.
desc.zh_cn: {cf静子}们，因{cf知世}的活跃成功发现了温泉。认输的{cn温泉开发部}，虽然将契约书交出……反而，{cf静子}提出了新的契约询问是否要和百夜堂缔结加盟契约进而营运温泉渡假胜地。

name.jp: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

name.jp: Messengers of the Black Tortoise Part 1

desc.en: Shizuko and the others arrive at an area said to be managed by the Black Tortoise Promenade of Shanhaijing. However, they find out that Date Meowru and the Kurogame Gang are managing the resort.
desc.jp: Shizuko and the others arrive at an area said to be managed by the Black Tortoise Promenade of Shanhaijing. However, they find out that Date Meowru and the Kurogame Gang are managing the resort.
desc.zh_cn: {cf静子}们下一个前往的是「对一切要求代价的玄武使者们」的岛屿。那里似乎是，由{sn山海经}的{cn玄武商会}营运的渡假胜地。然而却因投诉而炎上，前往观看情况却发现，进行了不当费用的要求，也没有像样服务等等的凄惨状况。愤于恶质渡假胜地的{cf静子}，老师在旁告知了他们并非{cn玄武商会}而是黑龟组的事实。

desc.en: Shizuko and the others head to the final battleground. However, they encounter the former Kaiser director, who was demoted to a salesperson. Shizuko rejects the Kaiser salesperson's investment offer, then a mysterious masked gang appears.
desc.jp: Shizuko and the others head to the final battleground. However, they encounter the former Kaiser director, who was demoted to a salesperson. Shizuko rejects the Kaiser salesperson's investment offer, then a mysterious masked gang appears.
desc.zh_cn: 等待着前往和头盔团进行最后之战的一行人是，过去将{sn阿拜多斯}逼近绝境的凯萨理事本人。目前负责章鱼银行营业职员的凯萨理事，即使向{cf静子}提案了新投资也被拒绝。就这样向着{cf静子}袭来的头盔团以及新人的泳装蒙面团……！{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn阿拜多斯}漫长的夏天，最后之战即刻开始！

desc.en: The powerful combat capabilities of the Track Crasher bring the Engineering Department and Veritas to their knees. When all hope seems lost, Noa comes up with a way to stop it in its tracks. The Anti-Halo Festival Group students in hiding are eventually caught by Sumire, finally bringing the incident to an end.
desc.jp: The powerful combat capabilities of the Track Crasher bring the Engineering Department and Veritas to their knees. When all hope seems lost, Noa comes up with a way to stop it in its tracks. The Anti-Halo Festival Group students in hiding are eventually caught by Sumire, finally bringing the incident to an end.
desc.zh_cn: 在「赛道破坏者」的强大战斗力面前，{cn工程师部}和{cn贝里塔斯}屡屡受挫。多亏{cf乃爱}想出来的点子，赛道破坏者才失去战斗能力，使战况得以反转。躲藏的「晄．反．会」学生也被{cf堇}一网打尽，骚动就此结束。

将{cn知识解放战线}推向崩溃的悲剧名作《LUNA》。为了与{cf红叶}和解，也为了{cn知识解放战线}的重新团结，爱瑠打算完成未完的《LUNA》……
究竟在同人之路的前方等待着的会是什么样的结局呢！？

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.

desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。
